mapper.select: select * from sys_roles_menus rm left join sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where rm.role_id=#{roleId, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sys_menu where title=#{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from sys_menu where name=#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from sys_menu where pid=#{pid, jdbcType=BIGINT}
select * from sys_menu where pid is null
select count(1) from sys_menu where pid = #{pid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
